name: Moloch
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Moloch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, burning hands (as a 7th-level spell), confusion, detect magic, fly, geas, major image, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire * 1/day each: flame strike, symbol (stunning only)

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
